Back in 2020 I started to compile and share financial data in [dataverse](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataverse/msperlin). The data covers corporate finance events from the DFP and FRE systems. The available tables are the same I use for my research and teaching material, and will be updated once a year. 

Today I updated all datasets. The available data are:

| R Package      | Source of Data    | Description | Direct Link | Last Update |
| -------------  |:-----------------:| :---------------------------------------------| :------------| :------------|
| GetTDData      | Tesouro Nacional  | Prices and yields of brazilian sovereign bonds | [Link](https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/SCSQUF) | 2021-04-09 |
| GetFREData     | CVM               | Corporate dataset from FRE systems| [Link](https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/QIMUNZ) | 2021-04-09 |
| BatchGetSymbols| Yahoo Finance     | Daily adjusted and unadjusted prices and trading volumes of stocks | [Link](https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/7NAG08) | 2021-04-09 |
| GetDFPData2     | CVM              | Annual Financial Reports from DFP system  | [Link](https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/7VVX4J) | 2021-04-09 |
